Description: Body sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery phiale mesomphalos; white slip; interior: glazed streaky black; trace of two bands in added white above band of alternating black and red tongues lined in white; exterior: two lines at top of sherd; below, part of elaborate rosette.
Curator's comments: For parallels, see Cambridge Museum of Classical Archaeology NA67.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 306, no. 1217)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1994) (phase 2)
